title: Game-Based Science and Engineering Practice Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and engineering principles, experience with VR device usage
context.additional_context: Enhancing scientific practical competencies for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to solve social issues.

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce scientific inquiry procedures with over 80% accuracy through goal-oriented problem-solving in a simulation environment.
Learners can propose optimal engineering design solutions within limited resources using VR-based game mechanics (energy acquisition/usage systems).
Learners can perform three or more iterative design improvements based on formative assessment feedback and write failure case analysis reports.

resources: Science and engineering lab kits (optional use)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
